title: Service Pipeline Config
description: Configuration file controlling linting, testing, building, image tagging, and Kubernetes deployment for a service.

$schema.description: Optional JSON Schema reference URI for tooling or validation.

enabled.description: Whether dependencies should be installed for this service.

command.description: The command executed to install dependencies.

lint.description: Configuration for linting and static analysis.

enabled.description: Whether linting should run for this service.

command.description: The command executed to perform linting.

test.description: Configuration for running unit or integration tests.

enabled.description: Whether tests should run for this service.

command.description: The command executed to run tests.

build.description: Configuration for building the service artifact.

enabled.description: Whether the build step should run for this service.

command.description: The command executed to build the service.

image.description: Configuration for building and tagging container images.

enabled.description: Whether a container image should be built for this service.

tagSeries.description: The base tag or tag prefix used when generating image tags.

repository.description: The container registry repository where the built image will be pushed.

context.description: Optional build context directory, relative to the current working directory, used for the docker build command.

dockerfile.description: Optional path to the Dockerfile, relative to the current working directory, used for the docker build command.

platform.description: Platform configuration for single or multi-architecture builds.

single.description: Whether to build a single-architecture image. When true, the build will automatically use the host machine's native CPU architecture.

multi.description: List of target platforms for multi-architecture builds. This list is ignored when 'single' is true.

enabled.description: Whether the deploy stage should run.
